name: PipeRoll HD
description:
PipeRoll 3D New York has already been available on the App Store! Official trailer: http://piperoll.net

Your task is to close the pipeline system as fast as possible rotating the pipes in the right direction. There are hundred levels which contain from one to four different liquids and a lot of tricks.

Develop your mind by a colourful puzzle game.
Control the flowing liquids as a smart plumber.


Features:
- 100 unique designed levels,
- 4 different liquids,
- country and city environments

In-App Purchases:
- 60 new levels
- Unlock all levels

Gameplay: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=pIQYqH6qIh8
